attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Set the component size. The value can be medium, small, or mini.

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Class name added to the DropTimes drop-down list box

attrs.name: popper-append-to-body
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to insert the pop-up box to the body element. If a fault occurs in locating the fault in the dialog box that is displayed, you can set this attribute to false (for details, see the select component).
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is {}.

attrs.name: placeholder
attrs.desc: Set the prompt placeholder text in the text box.

attrs.name: end
attrs.desc: End time, in minutes. The default value is 1440.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 1440.

attrs.name: start
attrs.desc: Start time, in minutes. The default value is 0.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: step
attrs.desc: Interval, in minutes. The default value is 15.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 15

events.name: change
events.desc: This event is triggered after the current time is switched by the pull-down button.
